about_the_game:
Includes the following DLC packs:


Honor Student Goddess Priest Set: Includes Head-Riding Whitey, Priest’s Head Protector, Halterneck and Cape, Swimsuit-Style Skirt, Simple Leather Sandals, Le Faye Style, Le Faye Face, Le Faye Portrait.

Fire and Ice Combo Set: Includes Gold Tiara, Blue Pattern, Ice Witch Top, Ice Witch Skirt, Ice Witch Sandals, Mayura Style, Mayura Face, Mayura Portrait, Bunny Ears Hairband, Flaming Crest, Flaming Adornment, Flaming Skirt, Flaming Boots, Hiro Style, Hiro Face, Hiro Portrait, Heaven’s Gate.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here:
detailed_description:
Includes the following DLC packs:


Honor Student Goddess Priest Set: Includes Head-Riding Whitey, Priest’s Head Protector, Halterneck and Cape, Swimsuit-Style Skirt, Simple Leather Sandals, Le Faye Style, Le Faye Face, Le Faye Portrait.

Fire and Ice Combo Set: Includes Gold Tiara, Blue Pattern, Ice Witch Top, Ice Witch Skirt, Ice Witch Sandals, Mayura Style, Mayura Face, Mayura Portrait, Bunny Ears Hairband, Flaming Crest, Flaming Adornment, Flaming Skirt, Flaming Boots, Hiro Style, Hiro Face, Hiro Portrait, Heaven’s Gate.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
